item.title: Revanced Apks (Youtube, X(Twitter), Reddit, Youtube Music) 10 Feb 2024
item.description: Revanced Apks for Youtube, Reddit and X(Twitter) I have explained what Revanced apps are in this post. For better understanding first checkout that post. Reddit Download link : github Apk version: 2024.06.0 Revanced features: Disable screenshot popup Hide ads Sanitize sharing links Unlock premium Reddit icons X(Twitter) Download link : github Apk version: 10.27.0 Revanced features: Dynamic color Hide ads Hide recommended users Youtube Download link : github Notes: In order to sign in to your google account you must download Vanced MicroG.

item.title: Revanced Youtube Music, 24 October 2023
item.description: Revanced Version of Youtube Music I have explained what Revanced apps are in this post. For better understanding first checkout that post. Mainly due to google killing google podcasts app, I’ll be switching to YouTube Music for podcast listening. Plus with revanced version of YT music, this is another platform for listening to songs for free. Note that like Youtube Revanced this supports VancedMicroG. I’ll link a trusted version of that as well.
